articles.author: Md Salman Ashrafi
articles.title: Tiger Global-backed BharatPe claims positive EBITDA in Oct 2023 - Entrackr
articles.description: Fintech unicorn BharatPe today announced that it has turned EBITDA positive in October 2023.

articles.author: Tushar Deep Singh
articles.title: Tech Mahindra Turnaround Hopes Already Priced In: Jefferies - BQ Prime
articles.description: Tech Mahindra may struggle to deliver above-average growth, especially when it is optimising its business mix, the brokerage said.
articles.content: "We believe consensus estimates carry significant risk as revenue growth (7% CAGR) and margin (530 bps expansion by FY26) seem very optimistic," they said in a note on Sunday. "This is likely to driv… [+1812 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Europe is guzzling diesel from India, a key buyer of Russian oil - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The region’s imports of diesel from India, one of the biggest buyers of Russian crude, are on course to soar to 305,000 barrels a day, the most since at least January 2017, data from market-intelligence firm Kpler show.
articles.content:
Europe banned most oil shipments from Russia almost a year ago, but its binging on diesel that may well have been made from Russian crude.
The regions imports of diesel from India, one of the bigges… [+2522 chars]
